    Subnets

    Written by Seif-Allah on 13 Mar 2021

    Summary

    • Introduction
    • How to Create Subnets

    Introduction

    When you define only one network, what happens if you wanted to take one network address and create six networks from it? You would have to do something called subnetting, because that’s what allows you to take one larger network and break it into a bunch of smaller networks. There are loads of reasons if favor of subnetting, including the following benefits:

    • Reduced network traffic

    • Optimized network performance

    • Simplified management

    • Facilitated spanning of large geographical distances
